ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] re: Fascinating article
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL -- I am a 42 year old father of four.  My wife and I group after the kids go to bed and we fight evil mushrooms in Luclin P Been fantasy gaming for years
ygData.messageBody:
LOL -- I am a 42 year old father of four. My wife and I group after the kids go to bed and we fight evil mushrooms in Luclin P

Been fantasy gaming for years and would have bought EQ even if the box had no cover-art.

EQmagickplayer@... wrote:

Great! I am a 44 year old mother of 2 teenagers - single - well-rounded (figure wise) - semi-computer literate.

Why was I drawn to EQ? Let's see the unconscious desire to be Firiona Vie? To seduce young male wood elves & enslave them as my personal sex slaves?

Yeah, right. Obviously it is the author of this article that has some suppressed sexual/masculine issues that need to be addressed.

Jovvi Songangel - 21 Half elf Bard - Drinal
Charai Bandroichta - 26 Halfling Druid - Drinal
